short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you easily find your Google place id and generate a Google review link for your business on Google Maps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the place id and generate the Google review link for any business on Google Maps.

Follow the steps below in order to obtain your Google review link:
1. Find your business on Google
2. Click on the ReviewsOnMyWebsite extension
3. Copy your Google review link and share it with your customers
